LANL Features¶

Aggregate Features¶

usage: lanl_agg_features [-h] [-datapath DATAPATH] [-outfile OUTFILE]
                         [-redpath REDPATH]
Options:
-datapath Path to files to transliterate.
-outfile Where to write derived features.
-redpath Where the json of completely specified redteam events is.

Character Features¶

usage: char_feats [-h] [-datapath DATAPATH] [-outfile OUTFILE]
Options:
-datapath Path to files to transliterate.
-outfile Where to write derived features.

Word Features¶

usage: word_feats [-h] [-datafile DATAFILE] [-outfile OUTFILE]
                  [-record_dir RECORD_DIR] [-redfile REDFILE]
Options:
-datafile=/home/hutch_research/data/lanl/auth_h.txt
 Path to files to transliterate.
-outfile=/home/hutch_research/data/lanl/char_feats/word_feats.txt
 Where to write derived features.
-record_dir=/home/hutch_research/data/lanl/char_feats/word_counts/
 Directory to dump frequency counts, and word token mappings in
-redfile=/home/hutch_research/data/lanl/redevents.txt
 Location of the completely specified redteam events file.
